query: My internet is not working since morning.
ask_prompt: Could you share your location (city) so we can troubleshoot network availability?

kb_result.title: Internet down / Router troubleshooting
kb_result.solution: Restart your router: power off for 30 seconds, then power on; check cables and LEDs.

retrievals.title: Internet down / Router troubleshooting
retrievals.solution: Restart your router: power off for 30 seconds, then power on; check cables and LEDs.

response_text: Hi Alice Johnson, based on our checks, please try: Restart your router: power off for 30 seconds, then power on; check cables and LEDs.
